Lyric:
[by:_WHITE_]
[00:08.64]Do you ever feel like a plastic bag
[00:12.43]Drifting through the wind
[00:14.47]Wanting to start again
[00:16.59]Do you ever feel, feel so paper thin
[00:20.09]Like a house of cards
[00:22.44]One blow from caving in
[00:24.25]Do you ever feel already buried deep
[00:27.89]Six feet under scream
[00:29.78]But no one seems to hear a thing
[00:32.22]Do you know that there's still a chance for you
[00:36.00]Cause there's a spark in you
[00:38.62]You just gotta ignite the light
[00:42.97]And let it shine
[00:46.81]Just own the night
[00:50.56]Like the Fourth of July
[00:54.06]Cause baby you're a firework
[00:57.91]Come on show 'em what your worth
[01:01.77]Make 'em go Oh, oh, oh!
[01:05.11]As you shoot across the sky-y-y
[01:09.24]Baby you're a firework

[01:17.26]Make 'em go Oh, oh, oh!
[01:20.58]You're gonna leave 'em fallin' down-own-own

[01:30.45]You're original, cannot be replaced
[01:34.38]If you only knew what the future holds
[01:38.11]After a hurricane comes a rainbow
[01:42.02]Maybe you're reason why all the doors are closed
[01:45.76]So you can open one that leads you to the perfect road
[01:49.72]Like a lightning bolt, your heart will blow
[01:52.29]And when it's time, you'll know
[01:56.21]You just gotta ignite the light
[02:01.08]And let it shine
[02:04.85]Just own the night
[02:08.79]Like the Fourth of July

[02:38.66]You're gonna leave 'em fallin' down-own-own
[02:44.07]Boom, boom, boom
[02:46.50]Even brighter than the moon, moon, moon

[02:54.24]And now it's time to let it through
